Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: g
Reviews.Content: Great pen! The picture quality is just as good as a full size camera. The light disappears so no one knows when it's recording, and it records for hours. Plugs into my PC. It takes photos as well as video. It is also actually a real pen that writes. I am pleasantly surprised and very happy with this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Mini DVR (video recording), DC (photo-taking), USB Drive on an elegant Ballpoint Writing Pen
User friendly One button operation with LED indicator; Real time video with date and time stamp
Built-in high capacity rechargeable Lithium battery ;Playback on PC by Windows Media Player
Support Micro SD/TF card up to 16GB (4GB is included) ;DO NOT charge over 4 hours or it will destroy the battery and void warranty!
One year manufacture Warranty , and lifetime Tech-Support (If you have any problem with this product, please click "contact seller " and send email to us, we will arrange our technician Support you)
